name: Billy Builds
description:
This is the first real demo of a strategy game I've been working on. For now:

  • 10 levels (last few are less balanced than the first ones)
  • Tech Tree
  • Lots of different units to mess around with

If you need help because my tutorial is terrible, or if you have feedback or suggestions, join the Discord here: https://discord.gg/EHkS4E6GMp

Thanks!
